staffmember.name: Wayne Beaton
staffmember.title: Eclipse Evangelist
staffmember.description: Wayne Beaton is employed by The Eclipse Foundation where he works as an evangelist, spreading the word and helping folks adopt Eclipse technologies. Wayne has extensive experience in object-oriented software development and is a strong proponent of refactoring, unit testing, and agile development methodologies.

staffmember.name: Janet Campbell
staffmember.title: Manager, Intellectual Property
staffmember.description: Outside of work, Janet enjoys traveling (to South East Asia in particular), walking her dogs, taking her bike for a spin and spending time with family and friends.

staffmember.name: Bjorn Freeman-Benson
staffmember.title: Director, Open Source Process
staffmember.description: While striving to be a Renaissance Man, Bjorn keeps falling back into the clutches of conformity with engineering stereotypes such as dynamic languages, software engineering, juggling and general aviation. His escape attempts have been through orienteering, bicycling, planting trees and painting his airplane. He is passionate about doing things instead of just talking about them, and he thoroughly enjoys the annual party he helps organize for the Eclipse community.

staffmember.name: Skip McGaughey
staffmember.title: Director, Ecosystem
staffmember.description: I have a favorite quote form Robert Kennedy which says... "Some look at the world and ask Why; others strive to create a better world by asking Why Not."

staffmember.name: Mike Milinkovich
staffmember.title: Executive Director
staffmember.description:
Outside of work, Mike's passions are his family, the family cottage and hockey (as a coach, player and fan) in pretty much that order. When he's not working, or traveling for work, you will probably find him involved in one of those three things.

You can read Mike's blog at http://milinkovich.blogspot.com/.

staffmember.name: Denis Roy
staffmember.title: Manager, IT Infrastructure
staffmember.description: At work, he stares at servers and blinking lights. At play, he enjoys outdoor sports that involve vehicles and gasoline engines. To Denis, life is at its best when he's on his snowmobile at the top of a mountain covered in fresh snow on a calm winter afternoon. Other interests include home renovation, auto mechanics, video games and his soon-to-be daughter.

staffmember.name: Ian Skerrett
staffmember.title: Director, Marketing
staffmember.description: Ian takes care of the marketing activities at the Eclipse Foundation. Although our community is the Eclipse marketing machine, Ian supports the projects and member companies to increase the awareness of all the cool stuff happening at Eclipse. You can read his blog at http://ianskerrett.blogspot.com/.

staffmember.name: Sharon Wolfe
staffmember.title: Office Manager
staffmember.description: Sharon has been with the Eclipse Foundation since July 2004. In addition to her Office Manager responsibilities, Sharon assists with marketing activities and also organizes or assists with the planning of various meetings and conferences. Sharon thanks Mike every day for opening a proper office because she was going stir crazy working out of the home office in her basement!
